job.title: Software Engineer - Health and Wellness
job.description: emWere looking for geniuses Dreamers Inventors Innovators People with the will to get stuff done Doers wholl rip an idea out of thin air Make it a reality Own itAnd amaze their peers Sound like you Welcome homebrbremstrongAs a Software Engineer for our Health amp Wellness team you will be a member of the HyVee delivery team following an agile delivery cadence Your primary focus is to help us make data and system integration within the HyVee ecosystem secure highly scalable and predictable You will work in a hybrid cloud environment helping to build our core platform infrastructure that hundreds of client applications will consume We are looking for people who can not only be great individual contributors but also pair program and mentor other engineersstrongstrongbrbrstrongstronguKey ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliCommit code for new features that enhance our products according to a well defined roadmapliliHelp us find insights and opportunities to improve our products through monitoring and dataliliPair with other team members to crosspollinate ideas and skillsliliChampion code quality maintainability and reliabilityliliContribute heavily to user story definition that takes our technology stack into consideration but also continue to push the bounds of what is possibleliliHelp maintain a positive open and productive team culturebrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliExpert level knowledge of one of the following programming languages JavaScript Java CliliProduction experience with JavaScript UI frameworks such as React or AngularliliProduction experience implementing RESTful APIsliliDemonstrable understanding of the components execution and security concerns of web applicationsliliDemonstrable grasp of logical data modeling techniques ex entity relationship diagramsliliExperience using version control preferably gitliliExperience writing tests for new code and the ability to articulate the benefits of testsbrliulstronguA Strong Candidate Will Also HavebrustrongulliExperience building cloudnative applications especially Google Cloud Platform GCPliliExperience working with containers kubernetes docker etcliliProduction experience writing CSSSASSLESSliliProduction experience with data storage systems such as PostgreSQL Mongo or ElasticsearchliliUnderstanding of eventoriented software architecturesliliProduction experience with OAuth and Identity Provider integrationliliDegree level qualifications in a technical related subjectliliDemonstrable knowledge of secure programming techniquesliliExperience with test driven design and general automationlilimay be filled at a lower or higher level depending on experiencebrliulstronguAbout HyVee IncbrbrustrongHyVee Inc is an employeeowned corporation operating more than 260 retail stores across eight Midwestern states with sales of 10 billion annually The supermarket chain is synonymous with quality variety convenience healthy lifestyles culinary expertise and superior customer service HyVee ranks in the Top 10 Most Trusted Brands and has been named one of Americas Top 5 favorite grocery stores The companys 80000 employees provide A Helpful Smile in Every Aisle to customers every daybrbrstrongVisit strongstrong to apply today and learn about all the exciting things our IT organization doesstrong
